title: Flesh to Stone
tags: how to acquire flesh to stone
content:
Flesh to Stone is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Flesh to Stone is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Flesh to Stone Information

Description: Atrophy a foe, Restrained them until they temporarily turn to stone. Target will Petrify if it does not succeed its Saving Throw within 3 turns. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: 1
